attributes.action: Ban the circumcision of all males under 18 in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite the fact that it has no health benefits, and can be seriously harmful to newborns, around 1 in 14 british boys are circumcised at birth, for cultural and/or religious reasons. However, the circumcision of girls has already been made illegal. It is time for this injustice to end, and to give all infant boys the protection they truly deserve.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban the circumcision of all males under 18 in the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14160.asp

Prime Minister's Office
